pages.text: Entity Glass is a type of glass that will block the movement of any entity, but will let players pass through it as if it were air.$(br)This can also be inverted to allow anything except players.$(br)Both variants will invert for players crouching.
Tinted Entity Glass works identically to Entity Glass, but also blocking light similar to Tinted Glass.
Both forms of Player Glass can be converted back to Entity Glass for no cost..
